name: Knob Sports
description: A 3D game where players create their own animations. This was the core concept of Knob Sports. After 280.5 hours of personal dev time plus many hours put in by my teammate Ryan Hancock I decided to stop working on the project due to scope issues (too ambitious). However, I learned a lot especially about working in a larger Unity/C# project as well as best practices for managing classes, inheritance, etc. and our efforts yielded a fun sandbox prototype.
